text:
OK: I been trying to find this.
For those who watch GT Countdowns at GameTrailers; there is a certain them I have been trying to find that was in one of them.
In the Top 10 Breakthrough PC Games; SimCity placed @ #5. There was a theme playing to it I liked but don't know what it is.
It recently appeared again in their newest countdown for the #1 spot. If you have heard it and know it; please PLEASE tell me what it is.
